remarks: Choice of an upper bound for a non empty bunded set (image set version).  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
upbdrech.a $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
upbdrech.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
upbdrech.bd $e |- ( ph -> E. y e. RR A. x e. A B <_ y ) $.
upbdrech.c $e |- C = sup ( { z | E. x e. A z = B } , RR , < ) $.
upbdrech $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. RR /\ A. x e. A B <_ C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d ph x y $.
